intro: Rendlia annua, commonly known as the annual rendlia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers. The plant produces small, daisy-like flowers with yellow centers and white petals. It thrives in well-drained soils and full sunlight. Rendlia annua is often used in ornamental gardening due to its delicate appearance and ease of cultivation.
